overview: Bogart & Ivan is a film Written and Directed by Charlie Steele - an independent Canadian filmmaker from Summerside, Prince Edward Island.  Shot entirely in Summerside, Bogart & Ivan follows best friends Bogart and Ivan on Ivanâ€™s last day on the Island. The pair get separated early on, and are forced to try and figure out how exactly they are meant to go on without the other.
title: Bogart & Ivan
